snippet: Three weak economic reports — and one positive one — knocked the market off balance. But economists noted that the final quarter of the year was often a good one for equities.
abstract: Stock markets gets off to rough start to October, with Dow Jones industrial average dropping nearly 240 points as investors react to round of negative economic news.
lead_paragraph: Three weak economic reports — and one positive one — knocked the market off balance. But economists noted that the final quarter of the year was often a good one for equities.

headline.main: Markets Buckle, Hit by Weak Economic News
headline.print_headline: Markets Buckle, Hit by Weak Economic News
